DOC.brief_summary: Objectives In study investigator examine change common femoral vein ( CFV ) great saphenous vein ( GSV ) calibre thermo neutral water immersion ( TNI ) , cold water immersion ( CWI ) contrast water therapy ( CWT ) . Design Ten professional handball player visit laboratory three occasion . At visit , participant complete 20-minutes procedure upright position : 4-minutes air ( baseline ) 16-minutes low limb TNI ( ~35째C ) , CWI ( ~12째C ) CWT ( 2:2minutes ( ~12째C ~35째C ) ratio ) , select randomly . Methods CFV GVS calibre evaluate echo Doppler measure baseline end 16 min immersion .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Various Modalities Water Immersion Veins
